type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.Launchable
type.description:
* Represents an object that can be used to launch a Gradle build, such as a task. * *

To launch a build, you pass one or more {@link org.gradle.tooling.model.Launchable} instances * to either {@link org.gradle.tooling.BuildLauncher#forTasks(Iterable)} or {@link org.gradle.tooling.BuildLauncher#forLaunchables(Iterable)}.

* * @since 1.12

method.name: getDescription
method.description: * Returns the description of this launchable, or {@code null} if it has no description. * * @return The description of this launchable, or {@code null} if it has no description. * @since 1.12

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: * Returns a human-consumable display name for this launchable. * * @return Display name of this launchable. * @since 1.12

method.name: getProjectIdentifier
method.description: * Returns the identifier for the Gradle project that this model originated from. * * @since 2.13

method.name: isPublic
method.description: * Returns whether launchable is public or not. A public launchable is one that is considered a public 'entry point' to the build, that is interesting for * an end user of the build to run. * * @return Public property. * @since 2.1

property.name: description
property.description: * Returns the description of this launchable, or {@code null} if it has no description. * * @return The description of this launchable, or {@code null} if it has no description. * @since 1.12

property.name: displayName
property.description: * Returns a human-consumable display name for this launchable. * * @return Display name of this launchable. * @since 1.12

property.name: projectIdentifier
property.description: * Returns the identifier for the Gradle project that this model originated from. * * @since 2.13

property.name: public
property.description: * Returns whether launchable is public or not. A public launchable is one that is considered a public 'entry point' to the build, that is interesting for * an end user of the build to run. * * @return Public property. * @since 2.1
